column2: "Nda esia ekyir no Jesus faa Peter nye James nye no nua John
column3: na ɔdze hɔn kɔr nkyɛn wɔ kokwaa tsentsen bi do;"

column4: na n’atar yɛɛ fitaa dɛ kan."

column3: Elija nye Moses puee hɔn nkyɛn
column4: na wɔnye Jesus kasae."
oye ma hɛn dɛ yɛtsena ha
mununkum hyɛnn bɛkataa hɔn do
column5: na ndze bi fi mununkum no mu see dɛ
column6: Oyi nye mo Dɔba a ɔsɔ m’enyi: hom ntsie no."

column4: na wosuroo pii."

column2: "Na Jesus bae dze ne nsa bɛkaa hɔn na ɔsee dɛ
column4: mma hom nnsuro."

column2: "Na wofi kokwaa no do risian no
column4: Mma hom nnka dza hom ehu yi nnkyerɛ obiara
column5: gyedɛ nyimpa Ba no asoɛr efi ewufo mu ana."

column2: "Na n’esuafo no bisaa no see dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na Akyerɛwfo no ka dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ Elija dzi kan ba?"

column4: odzi kan ba ampa

column2: "na mese hom dɛ Elija aba dada
column4: na wɔyɛɛ no dza wɔpɛe nyina. Dɛmara na nyimpa Ba no so bohu hɔn nsa mu amandze."

column2: "Nna esuafo no hun dɛ ɔreka John Onumanyi no no ho asɛm."

column3: nyimpa bi baa no hɔ bɔkotoow no see dɛ
column7: na otwa ehim na ohu amandze bɔn
column8: na ɔtɔ dɛ ɔhwe gya mu
column9: na ɔtɔ dɛ ɔhwe nsu mu."

column3: Ao ɔsantsen a hom nnyi gyedzi na hom akyea
column4: menye hom ntsena nkodu dabɛn? Minsie hom ho abotar nkodu dabɛn? Hom mfa no mbrɛ me ha."

column3: na abɔnsam no fii no mu firii; na ofitsi dɔn no ara mu na abofra no ne yarba gyaae."

column2: "Nna esuafo no baa Jesus hɔ wɔ nkyɛn
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn na yeenntum enntu no?"

column3: Hom gyedzi suar ntsi a: na nokwar mese hom dɛ
column4: Sɛ hom wɔ gyedzi a ɔtse dɛ sinape abafua a
column5: nkyɛ hom bɛse kokwaa yi dɛ
column8: na nkyɛ biribiara ronnso hom yɛ."

column2: "( Naaso iyi ne saso mmfir edzi
column3: gyedɛ ɔnam mpaabɔ ɔnye mbuadadzi do. )"
column4: "#17.21 Dɛm nkyekyɛmu yi nnyi asɔpɔn kyerɛw no mu mbom tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi na wɔdze sɔw do."
Woribeyi Nyimpa Ba no ahyɛ nyimpa nsa;"

column3: na da a otsia ebiasa no obenyan.  Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn awerɛhow pii."
hɔn a wɔgyegye asɔrdan ho tow no baa Peter nkyɛn bɛsee dɛ
column4: Ana hom kyerɛkyerɛnyi no nntua asɔrdan ho tow no?"
Jesus dzii kan bisaa no dɛ
column6: edwen dɛn? Asaase do ahemfo no woananom hɔ na wɔgyegye amandze anaa tow? Hɔn mba hɔ anaa anana hɔ a?"

column4: Jesus see no dɛ
column5: Ɔno dze na mba no fa hɔnho dzi."

column2: "Naaso mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma yɛnnkɔfom hɔn ntsi
column4: na fa nam a obedzi kan aba no
column6: ibohu sika wɔ mu: fa kotua ma emi na ɔwo."
